data.text: Asase nyinaa momfa ahosɛpɛ nteam mma Onyankopɔn!
Monto ne din animuonyamhyɛ ho dwom;
Monse Onyankopɔn sɛ, “Wo nneyɛɛ yɛ nwanwa
Asase nyinaa koto wo;
Mommra mmɛhwɛ deɛ Onyankopɔn ayɛ;
Ɔmaa ɛpo yɛɛ asase kesee;
Ɔde ne tumi di ɔhene daa daa,
Ao aman nyinaa, monhyira yɛn Onyankopɔn,
Wahwɛ yɛn nkwa so
Na wo, Ao Onyankopɔn, wosɔɔ yɛn hwɛeɛ;
Wode yɛn kɔguu nneduadan mu
Womaa yɛn atamfoɔ twi faa yɛn so;
Mede ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ bɛba wʼasɔredan mu
ɛbɔ a mʼano fafa hyɛeɛ na mʼano kaaeɛ
Mede mmoa a wɔadɔ sradeɛ bɛbɔ afɔdeɛ ama wo
Mommra mmɛtie, mo a mosuro Onyankopɔn nyinaa;
Mede mʼano su frɛɛ no;
Sɛ mede bɔne hyɛɛ mʼakomam a,
Nanso, nokorɛm, Onyankopɔn atie me,
Nhyira nka Onyankopɔn,
